channel.title: Portfolios on Chen Zhe
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Chen Zhe

item.title: Chen Zhe's Photo Portfolio
item.description: To me, photography is more than just art. Because every time the shutter curtains click, my camera captures a moment that I can never relive again. Be it a moment of joy, surprise, tranquility or sorrow, photo is a window to the past, and it’s from the past that I can gain experience and strength to fight in the present. You can browse through my curated photos using the navigation buttons, touch swipes (↑↓←→), scroll wheel, or ←→ arrow keys.
